definition: in different poses and with different expressions/in thousands of postures (idiom)

sentences.english: The answers have to be colorful.
sentences.chinese: 這個問題的答案一定是千姿百態的。

sentences.english: People do beautiful things in the water.
sentences.chinese: 人們在水裏表現出千姿百態。

sentences.english: Treasure Tripod Temple is among stones of different weird shapes, known as a Little Stone Forest.
sentences.chinese: 寶鼎寺周圍盡是千姿百態的石頭，俗稱小石林。

sentences.english: A variety of patterns and forms of Huangshan pine have a great relationship between the natural environment .
sentences.chinese: 黃山松的千姿百態和黃山自然環境有着很大的關係。

sentences.english: Here are a large amount of Taihu Stones with strange shapes in various poses, all vivid to life.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是一片奇形怪狀的太湖石，千姿百態，惟妙惟肖。

sentences.english: The purpose and the style of every Taiwan's modern poet are different.
sentences.chinese: 臺灣每個現代派詩人都有獨特的追求，風格千姿百態。

sentences.english: Lotus in different poses and with different expressions, the pure white, pure as crystal.
sentences.chinese: 荷花千姿百態，潔白無暇，像水晶一樣純潔。

sentences.english: Kit Kat Wizard of thousands of Rime, the simple and honest clumsy shrubs pure heaven.
sentences.chinese: 精靈奇巧的霧凇千姿百態，笨拙憨厚的灌木清純天成。

sentences.english: Then the city and the harbor of Yokohama , in a thousand pictures, began flashing before his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 於是橫濱市和橫濱港以其千姿百態在他眼前閃過。

sentences.english: Thousands of deformed structures in the rocks of the earth's crust are the products of earth power.
sentences.chinese: 地殼岩石中千姿百態的構造變形都是力的作用結果。

sentences.english: The panorama of colour and action which fills the world is taken for granted.
sentences.chinese: 大千世界的五光十色與千姿百態被認爲是理所當然。

sentences.english: Mix of the stalactite cave, strange shapes.
sentences.chinese: 洞中的鐘乳石千姿百態，形狀奇特。

definition: living spirit, living image (idiom); true to life/vivid and realistic
to blend into one another/to blend together well
bright and beautiful/(of a landscape) gorgeous/(of a color) vibrant
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
